instructions.1: Heat butter and oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
instructions.2: Lightly sprinkle salt and pepper over chicken breasts. When oil is hot, add chicken breasts. Cook until golden brown on one side, turn and continue to cook until cooked through, 5 to 6 minutes per side. Transfer to 4 individual serving plates before returning the pan to the heat.
instructions.3: In a small bowl, mix the salsa, broth, lime and lemon juice. Pour into hot skillet, stirring until the sauce has reduced, about 1 to 2 minutes. Whisk in sour cream. Spoon a portion of sauce over each chicken breast and serve immediately.
